articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump election: Priebus and Bannon given key roles
articles.description: US President-elect Donald Trump gives key roles to a top Republican and a right-wing media chief.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: NHS bosses 'trying to keep cuts secret'
articles.description: NHS chiefs have tried to keep local plans to cut hospital services in England secret, a study finds.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Skywatchers prepare for 'supermoon'
articles.description: Skywatchers are preparing for the 'supermoon' as the moon makes its closest approach since 1948.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: New Zealand hit by second strong quake
articles.description: A second strong quake hits New Zealand, as a large river breaches its banks sending a "wall of water" downstream.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: May: Britain has 'historic chance' to give leadership to world
articles.description: Britain has an 'historic opportunity' to provide the leadership the world needs, the PM will say.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Police crackdown on use of mobiles when driving
articles.description: Police in England and Wales launch a week-long crackdown on motorists using their mobiles.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump election: EU leaders expect 'strong partnership' with US
articles.description: EU foreign ministers want to "engage" with US President-elect Donald Trump.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Online bullying counselling on increase, says Childline
articles.description: The number of children needing help over online bullying has gone up 88% over five years, says a helpline.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Controversial 'Tinder death' interview airs in Australia
articles.description: An Australian man acquitted of killing his Tinder date is quizzed if he is "heartless".
